mapper.select: SELECT OWNER_ID FROM CON_OWNER WHERE OWNER_ID =#{owner_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE CON_OWNER SET OWNER_BIRTH=#{owner_birth} WHERE OWNER_ID=#{owner_id}
UPDATE CON_OWNER SET OWNER_OUT='Y' WHERE OWNER_ID=#{owner_id}
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_COUNT,LIKE_COUNT ,PAY_COUNT,REPLY_COUNT ,QNA_COUNT,cs.STORE_SEQ FROM CON_STORE cs,(SELECT COUNT(cr.reserve_seq) AS reserve_count FROM con_store cs,CON_RESERVE cr WHERE cs.STORE_SEQ =cr.STORE_SEQ AND cs.OWNER_ID =#{owner_id} AND cr.reserve_succes!='Y' AND cr.reserve_state!='C') , (SELECT COUNT(cl.LIKE_LIST_SEQ) AS like_count FROM CON_STORE cs ,CON_LIKE cl WHERE cs.store_seq=cl.STORE_SEQ AND cs.OWNER_ID =#{owner_id}) , (SELECT count(cr.RESERVE_SEQ) AS pay_count FROM CON_STORE cs ,CON_RESERVE cr WHERE cs.STORE_SEQ =cr.STORE_SEQ AND cs.OWNER_ID =#{owner_id} AND cr.RESERVE_SUCCES ='Y') , (SELECT COUNT(cr.REPLY_SEQ) AS reply_count FROM CON_STORE cs ,CON_REPLY cr WHERE cs.STORE_SEQ =cr.STORE_SEQ AND OWNER_ID =#{owner_id} AND cr.REPLY_DELFLAG ='N'), (SELECT COUNT(cq.QNA_SEQ) AS qna_count FROM CON_STORE cs ,CON_QNA cq WHERE cs.STORE_SEQ =cq.STORE_SEQ AND OWNER_ID =#{owner_id} AND cq.qna_delflag='N') WHERE OWNER_ID=#{owner_id}
SELECT REPLY_READ ,QNA_READ FROM (SELECT cr.REPLY_READ ,cq.QNA_READ FROM CON_REPLY cr ,CON_QNA cq WHERE cr.STORE_SEQ =#{store_seq} AND cr.STORE_SEQ =cq.STORE_SEQ)
